title: Dear lol.
body:
If you ever need any voice acting done, I can cook up as many cool voices for characters as I want! 
Pls give me chance rito, I'm on oce and my ign is; Rivalrry

replies.body:
I doubt anyone will actually reply to this. If you're seriously interested in a voice acting spot with Riot, then you should apply [here](http://www.riotgames.com/careers).

Keep in mind Riot is looking for professionals. So the real best way, is to sign with an agent, who will do his magic for you.
Someone give this man a cookie for being a genuine bloke on Boards
I could do with a cookie right now actually :D
